Text.Page: The Lokians are controlling {@LinkCreature:18#18#giant gladiators} at the Arena of the Exalted. If they should decide to turn them against us, I wouldn't give a lot for our chances. Take a few out and report back. I need to know just how deadly they are.
Thank you, <PCNAME>. Can you tell Anaka about this? She's been after me about the giants for a while.
